name: Ayiwün
description:
Ayiwün is a narrative video game where we play as Ayelén, a girl on her way to become a Machi, a healer shaman from the Mapuche people.

Through her journey, we will learn about the Mapuche people thanks to the different totems that we’ll encounter, they will be our guides to the spiritual plane, where we will discover part of the story and secrets of a forgotten race, obtaining new powers to help Ayelén aid other people who need her.
